DOC.brief_title: End-Stage Renal Disease Intra-dialysis Lifestyle Education Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose prospective , randomized clinical trial among maintenance hemodialysis compare effect intra-dialysis yoga educational program . In sample 68 patient investigator compare clinical effect 12-week program yoga 12-week education program dialysis . Outcome assessment study participant occur baseline , 6-weeks , 12-weeks , 24 week : disease-related quality life ( physical component primary outcome study ) , physical performance , blood pressure , fatigue , satisfaction dialysis , sleep quality , mood . Among sub-sample 20 participant , investigator measure potential effect intervention endothelial function , arterial stiffness , autonomic tone . The sub-study collect outcome baseline 12 week .
